001/*

006
007package renderer.pipeline;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import static renderer.pipeline.PipelineLogger.*;
012
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015
016/**
017   Clip a (projected) geometric {@link Primitive} that sticks out
018   of the camera's view rectangle in the image plane. Interpolate
019   {@link Vertex} color from any clipped off {@link Vertex} to the
020   new {@link Vertex}.
021*/
022public class Clip
023{
024   public static boolean debug = false;
025
026   /**
027      Start with a {@link Model} that contains {@link Primitive}s
028      that have been projected onto the camera's view plane,
029      {@code z = -1}.
030   <p>
031      If a projected {@link Primitive} sticks out of the camera's
032      view rectangle, then replace that {@link Primitive}, in the
033      {@link Model}'s list of primitives, with one that has been
034      clipped so that it is contained in the view rectangle.
035   <p>
036      If a projected {@link Primitive} is completely outside of
037      the view rectangle, then drop that {@link Primitive} from
038      the {@link Model}'s list of primitives.
039   <p>
040      Return a {@link Model} for which every {@link Primitive} is
041      completely contained in the camera's view rectangle.
042
043      @param model  {@link Model} containing projected {@link Primitive}s
044      @return a {@link Model} containing {@link Primitive}s clipped to the view rectangle
045   */
046   public static Model clip(final Model model)
047   {
048      // Replace the model's list of colors with a shallow copy.
049      final Model model2 =  new Model(model.vertexList,
050                                      model.primitiveList,
051                                      new ArrayList<>(model.colorList),
052                                      model.name,
053                                      model.getMatrix(),
054                                      model.nestedModels,
055                                      model.textureList,
056                                      model.texCoordList,
057                                      model.visible,
058                                      model.doBackFaceCulling,
059                                      model.frontFacingIsCCW,
060                                      model.facesHaveTwoSides);
061
062      final List<Primitive> newPrimitiveList = new ArrayList<>();
063
064      for (final Primitive p : model2.primitiveList)
065      {
066         logPrimitive("9. Clipping", model2, p);
067
068         final List<Primitive> p_clipped;
069
070         if (p instanceof LineSegment)
071         {
072            p_clipped = Clip_Line.clip(model2, (LineSegment)p);
073         }
074         else if (p instanceof Points)
075         {
076            p_clipped = Clip_Points.clip(model2, (Points)p);
077         }
078         else // if (p instanceof Triangle)
079         {
080            p_clipped = Clip_Triangle.clip(model2, (Triangle)p);
081         }
082
083         if ( ! p_clipped.isEmpty() )
084         {
085            // Keep the primitives that are visible.
086            newPrimitiveList.addAll( p_clipped );
087
088            for (final Primitive p2 : p_clipped)
089            {
090               logPrimitive("9. Clipped (accept)", model2, p2);
091            }
092         }
093         else
094         {
095            // Discard the primitives that are not visible.
096            logPrimitive("9. Clipped (reject)", model2, p);
097         }
098      }
099
100      // Replace the model's original list of line segments
101      // with the list of clipped line segments.
102      return new Model(model2.vertexList,  // has been updated with clipped vertices
103                       newPrimitiveList,   // clipped primitives
104                       model2.colorList,   // has been updated with interpolated colors
105                       model2.name,
106                       model2.getMatrix(),
107                       model2.nestedModels,
108                       model2.textureList,
109                       model2.texCoordList,
110                       model2.visible,
111                       model2.doBackFaceCulling,
112                       model2.frontFacingIsCCW,
113                       model2.facesHaveTwoSides);
114   }
115
116
117
118   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
119   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
120   private Clip() {
121      throw new AssertionError();
122   }
123}
